bill_title: Honoring Chad Ferley, Jesse Bail, J.J. Elshere, Billy Etbauer, Bryce Miller, and Jeff Willert on their achievements in the Saddle Bronc competition at the 2006 PRCA National Finals Rodeo.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Chad Ferley, Jesse Bail, J.J. Elshere, Billy Etbauer, Bryce Miller, and Jeff Willert on their achievements in the Saddle Bronc competition at the 2006 PRCA National Finals Rodeo. WHEREAS, all six men are native sons of the State of South Dakota, and participated in the Saddle Bronc competition at the 2006 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo in Las Vegas, Nevada; and WHEREAS, in the world standings, Chad Ferley placed first, J.J. Elshere placed sixth, Billy Etbauer placed seventh, Jeff Willert placed ninth, Jesse Bail placed thirteenth, and Bryce Miller placed fourteenth; and WHEREAS, the top Saddle Bronc of 2006, Slippery, was bred, born, and raised in South Dakota by the Korkows: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Chad Ferley, Jesse Bail, J.J. Elshere, Billy Etbauer, Bryce Miller, and Jeff Willert be honored for their achievements in the Saddle Bronc competition at the National Finals Rodeo.

Elshere, Billy Etbauer, Bryce Miller, and Jeff Willert be honored for their achievements in the Saddle Bronc competition at the National Finals Rodeo.
